verbs.description: [ARG0: North Korean state media] [V: broke] [ARG1: form] and featured unedited photos of leader Kim Jong Un walking around Singapore and meeting with President Donald Trump in their latest editions . The papers may reflect a new era of increased media openness as the nation tries to portray itself as a global player .
